original_text: Be it known therefore unto you, that the salvation of God is sent unto the Gentiles, and that they will hear it.
korean_text: 그런즉 하나님의 이 구원이 이방인에게로 보내어진 줄 알라 그들은 그것을 들으리라 하더라

sentences.original_text: Be it known therefore unto you
that the salvation of God is sent unto the Gentiles
and that they will hear it
